code: import React from"react";import{makeStyles}from"@material-ui/core/styles";import Rating from"@material-ui/lab/Rating";import{useQuery}from"@apollo/react-hooks";import{useAverageRating}from"src/Hooks/useAverageRating";import{USER_RATINGS}from"src/Services/GQL/USER_RATINGS";export default function AverageRatingStars(_ref){var userId=_ref.userId;var classes=useStyles();var ratingStates=useQuery(USER_RATINGS,{variables:{host_id:userId}});var _useAverageRating=useAverageRating(ratingStates.data&&ratingStates.data.showRatings),averageRating=_useAverageRating.averageRating;return React.createElement(Rating,{name:"simple-controlled",readOnly:true,value:averageRating});}var useStyles=makeStyles(function(theme){return{mainContainer:{padding:5},mainHeader:{width:"100%",fontWeight:600,color:"grey"}};});
